casebody.data:
Lennard TOCCALINE
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 14, 2017

Andrew P. O'Shea, in support of the petition.

Marjorie Allen Dauster, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Lennard Toccaline's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 177 Conn. App. 480, 172 A.3d 821 (2017), is denied.
